Title: Establishes the East of Hudson watershed road salt reduction task force, pilot plan and test program
Summary: Establishes the East of Hudson watershed road salt reduction task force, pilot plan and test program to conduct a comprehensive review of road salt contamination and road management best practices within the East of Hudson watershed.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish the East of Hudson watershed road salt reduction task force and pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
